title: Here's when the Motorola Edge 70 is rumored to reach India
description:
The Motorola Edge 70 had its international launch in late October, after having been first announced as the X70 Air in China. It still hasn't made it to India, but according to a tipster over on X, that will change soon.

[#InlinePriceWidget,14216,1#]
